sourcesContent:
export const spacings = {
  xxxSmall: '8px',
  xxSmall: '16px',
  xSmall: '24px',
  small: '32px',
  medium: '40px',
  large: '48px',
  xLarge: '64px',
  xxLarge: '80px',
}

const colors = {
  blue: '#2C3E50',
  cyan: '#2980B9',
  yellow: '#F1C40F',
  green: '#27AE60',
  white: '#FFFFFFFF',
  grayFill: '#ECF0F1',
  grayStroke: '#BDC3C7',
}

export const theme = {
  spacings,
  colors,
  fontSizes: {
    t1: '18px',
    t2: '26px',
    t3: '36px',
    t4: '42px',
  },
}
